name: Gender Reveal - Enter Player 3
description:
Summary: Enter Player 3, is a 2-player (co-op) platform game for expecting parents and ideal for at home gender reveals! The rules are simple. Race to the top to reveal the gender. Whichever player reaches the giant bottle at the end of the course first wins! There are also multiple mini bottles scattered around to make the game more challenging.

Now, assuming that the person reading this is the honored guest in charge of setting up the gender reveal, please keep reading. IF YOU ARE THE PARENTS,   STOP  READING HERE. *************

Suggestions:  Discretely download the game  without giving away the gender.   Furthermore, to add to the competitiveness, purchase a fun award like a trophy for the the winning parent. Ensure you have a laptop with an HDMI cable to connect to the TV if needed. You will also need 2 USB ports for 2 player controllers. (If you can, purchase blue and pink controllers for the expecting parents!) You can playtest the game with someone before choosing to use this game as the gender reveal, just do not collect the giant bottle at the end of the course if you are with a member of the party. Most importantly enjoy! EnterPlayer3_1 (girl)  EnterPlayer3_2(boy). 

Needed equipment: 2 players,  2 controllers, Laptop, HDMI cable (to connect to TV if needed)

Feedback: This is only my second full project.  If you have any recordings of the reveal or simply of you just enjoying the game, please tag me in it (@megthegamer_Pas) or email me (eatenfan05@gmail.com). I would love to see it. Feel free to share any suggestions or your thoughts on the game!

Disclaimer: Game may have minor glitches. Please play test it first to decide if you would like to use this game for the reveal. Also, be mindful of the version your downloading! Please ensure you've downloaded the right version for the surprise gender. Best wishes.
